title: Strengthening Medical Practical Competencies: Mobile Application Development for Children’s Education Using Digital Storytelling

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mobile application usage experience and foundational mathematical concepts
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: The design process for a mobile learning application for children can be explained by applying the five stages of the ADDIE model
Animation storytelling techniques incorporating age-appropriate touch gestures and educational exaggerations can be developed
Educational content scenarios reflecting sociocultural values that internalize mathematical concepts can be created

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
